nodes.text: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Game Master's Kit

Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Game Master's Kit contains a Game Master's Screen and Debts to Pay, a pre-written adventure for the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire roleplaying game. It was released on July 5, 2013.

The universe of Star Wars: Edge of the Empire is full of smugglers, explorers, pirates, crime lords, and mysterious bounty hunters, and if you want to survive, you'll need quick wits and a good blaster…

Edge of the Empire adventures transport you and your friends to some of the shadiest corners of the Star Wars galaxy. You'll enjoy clever plots, thrilling action, and deep, immersive storytelling. And you can keep your focus squarely on the ongoing story with two new, helpful Edge of the Empire accessories: Edge of the Empire Roleplay Dice and the Edge of the Empire Game Master's Kit.
